title: Update Product Location in System
description: A product's primary location has been moved to a different aisle. The system needs to be updated.

tasks.description: Look up the product in the inventory management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate finds the item's record.

tasks.description: Navigate to the location management section for the item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate accesses the field for the item's primary location.

tasks.description: Update the aisle and bay number to the new location and save the change.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system now has the correct location, ensuring other associates and online stock checkers can find the product.
